description:
What's AJAX?

AJAX = Asynchronous JavaScript and XML

It's a web development technique widely used by popular websites.

It's not a new programming language, but a way or technique to use existing web standards. If you don't anything about AJAX then you can learn from this course.

AJAX can be used to send a request to the server and get a response back from the server, and during this time, the page will not be reloaded/refreshed, it does every job in the background, and web browsing experience gets a lot better.

What this course means for you?

If you are a new web developer using PHP and JavaScript or jQuery and you don't know much about AJAX then this short course is for you, You can learn AJAX from very basic in this course, and You'll also learn creating a small project in this course using AJAX, jQuery and PHP.

What's included with the course?

With this short course, You'll also get the whole source code, and You'll be able to create a few small applications using AJAX after watching this basic course.

Is support available for this course?

Yes, if you got any question during the course, you can ask me anytime, just post your question in the discussion forum of this course on Udemy, and I'll be there to answer it as soon as I'm available on Udemy.
title: Learn AJAX with PHP from Scratch using jQuery
